mapper.select: select * from latestview where vmnum=#{vmnum} and vunum=#{vunum}
mapper.delete: delete from (SELECT B.vnum, B.vmnum ,A.* FROM tmovie A inner JOIN latestview B ON A.mnum = B.vmnum AND B.vunum=#{vunum} order by vnum desc) where vnum not in(select * from (select max(vnum) from (SELECT B.vnum, B.vmnum ,A.* FROM tmovie A inner JOIN latestview B ON A.mnum = B.vmnum AND B.vunum=#{vunum} order by vnum desc) group by mname ) )
